title: ISSO: verification of your "Passeport Talent" application file before your appointment in Grenoble
description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes to all PhD students, researchers and their families doing research in one of our partner institutions in Grenoble.

Important

I. You cannot submit a residence permit application directly through this form. It is only intended for the verification of your application file by ISSO before we submit it to the Isère Prefecture. The procedure is detailed on our website: https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/getting-organized/visas-and-residence-permits/ Section Apply for a "Passeport Talent" residence permit in Grenoble.
II. The validation of your file by ISSO does not guarantee it will be approved by the Isère Prefecture.
III. Due to the Covid-19 pandemic, ISSO will only check application files submitted through this online form.

Once you complete the form, ISSO will give you a feedback within a week (on average).
The information you provide in filling out this questionnaire will be saved electronically only for the time needed to review your documents, and will be treated as strictly confidential. Only staff members from UGA department of International Affairs (DGD DIT) will be able to access your documents. No information will be communicated to anyone outside of the university. If you wish to exercise your rights within the framework of the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation, you can make a request by contacting: isso@univ-grenoble-alpes.fr.
zones: Ministère de l'Enseignement supérieur et de la Recherche

champDescriptors.label: Before you start
champDescriptors.description:
This service is provided by the International Students & Scholars Office (ISSO) of Université Grenoble Alpes.

> You cannot submit a residence permit application to the Préfecture directly through this form, it is only intended to check your documents before bringing them.
> Only for the following requests will be considered : "Passeport Talent Chercheur", "Passeport Talent Familles", "Recherche d'emploi ou Création d'Entreprise" (Job seeking). Others applications (salarié, réfugié, etc.) will not be reviewed.

>The list of all required documents is available on UGA international website: 
https://international.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/en/
Section: Getting Organized > Visas and residence permits > Apply for a "Passeport Talent" residence permit in Grenoble
